properties.description: This pipeline is triggered from the wrapper pipeline PL_KHCDE_ECOMMERCE_SCHEDULE_JOBS_HOURLY_WRAPPER. This pipeline will execute downstream processes like WPR,CPL,RST,MS and extract the data if required. Also, this pipeline is driven by metadata and using generic DBT run and data extract pipelines

activities.name: Fetch_Metadata
activities.description: This activity is to fetch the metadata entries by using given parameters.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name ='@{pipeline().parameters.Application_Name}' and  dataset_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.dataset_name}' and active_ind='y' and data_level=@{pipeline().parameters.data_level}

activities.name: START_JOBS_RUN_EXTRACT
activities.description: This activity logs that PNL RUN has started into khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Fetch_Metadata_Audit_Detail_Failure
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Fetch_Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: JOBS_RUN_Audit_Detail_Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of PNL_RUN_ activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and success of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Initiate_Jobs_RUN__Audit_Detail_Failure
activities.description: This activity logs failure of PNL_RUN activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Fetch_Metadata_Audit_Detail_Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of Fetch_Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and success of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Ecommerce_JOBS_RUN_PipelineSuccess
activities.description: This activity indicates success of pipeline PNL_RUN_

activities.name: Execute_DBT_MODEL
activities.description: Execute DBT models for downstream like WPR,RST,CPL,MS etc

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of the snowflake table and blob location from khc_enggextract_metadata table which needs to extracted.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_enggextract_metadata where dataset_group ='@{pipeline().parameters.dataset_name}' and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: SP-Success_03
activities.description: This activity logs success of  LU-MetaData activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_03
activities.description: This activity logs failure of LU-Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: IF_Check_LKP_OUTPUT
activities.description: Checks if data extraction is required or not. If not then ends the pipeline run and if yes, then call data extract pipeline

ifTrueActivities.name: EP-Snowflake_Extraction
ifTrueActivities.description:
This activity executes the EP-snowflakeExtraction pipeline.
Parameters are passed from the output of enggcontainer_metadata activity.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Success_05
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of Ep-snowflakeExtraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Failure_05
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs failure of EP-Snowflake_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

ifTrueActivities.name: PNL_RUN_END
ifTrueActivities.description: This Activity logs completion of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: FE_OUTBOUND_FOLDER
activities.description: This activity removes each extract_blob_location folder from outbound folder.

activities.name: Get_Metadata_of_outbound
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of extract_blob_location.

activities.name: IF_outbound_folder_exists
activities.description: This activity checks if extract_blob_location folder exists or not.

ifTrueActivities.name: DL_OUTBOUND_FOLDER
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity deletes the extract_blob_location from outbound folder.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Success_03_02_01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of DL_OUTBOUND_FOLDER activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Failure_03_02_01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs failure of DL_OUTBOUND_FOLDER activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

ifTrueActivities.name: CP_Archival_ADLS
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity  archival the unloaded files.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Success_02_02_01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of  CP_Archival_ADLS in IF_outbound_folder_exists table.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Failure_02_02_01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs failure of CP_Archival_ADLS activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Success_03_01
activities.description: This activity logs success of Get_metadata_of_outbound activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Success_03_02
activities.description: This activity logs success of IF_outbound_folder_exists activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_03_01
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Get_Metadata_of_outbound activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_03_02
activities.description: This activity logs failure of IF_outbound_folder_exists activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Success_04
activities.description: This activity logs success of FE_OUTBOUND_FOLDER activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_04
activities.description: This activity logs failure of FE_OUTBOUND_FOLDER activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.
